law.catch_line: The bond required by this subtitle shall be:...

text.section:
The bond required by this subtitle shall be:
payable to the State;
conditioned that the trading stamp company shall redeem its trading stamps whenever rightful holders present them for redemption; and
executed by:
the trading stamp company; and
a corporate surety qualified to do business in the State.

section.section: The amount of the bond shall be based on the gross income of the principal obligor from trading stamp business in the State during its last fiscal year.
